Alex Lu bụ onye isi ụwa na onye isi njikwa maka Rlg Communications, nke dị na Dubai, nke na-ahụ maka ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na mmepe azụmaahịa maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Tupu ịbanye Rlg, ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke BYD Electronic (BYD. Lu duuru BYD gaa Dell, Kodak na Compal (HP) na-eweta ihe.
Lu, dị ka onye isi nke Energy Storage Systems maka BYD, bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na Eurosol iji zụlite ụlọ ọrụ ike ndụ ndụ.
